website_summaries.verdict: One budget alternative breast pump bag to consider if you want a more straightforward design and layout.
pros: Uses an easy-to-adjust strap that securely attaches to the bag
Comfortable to wear for long periods of time
A single main compartment with front zipper pockets and one mesh pocket provide ample space for small items
Features power adapter access port for charging
cons: Some found it too small to fit the pump

customer_reviews.title: Tight squeeze to fit all parts in
customer_reviews.text: The bag functions. However, when I bought this bag I didn't realize how big of a deal it was to take the Medela Pump in Style in and out of the bag at each pump. The bag will fit the pump, a cooler and parts, but just barely. It is a tight squeeze and you basically have to take out everything at each pump and tetris them back in. Knowing what I know now, I would not have bought this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hinterweger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working moms on the go.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag. It's perfect for me (working mom) and fits everything I need. I have my pump, the small 4 bottle storage cooler medela makes, car adaptor, wall adaptor, cleaning wipes, pump parts all in this bag. Everything is at my fingertips when I'm using it, no digging through the bag to find anything. I would recommend this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because there weren't many choices for breast ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because there weren't many choices for breast pump bags unless you bought the pump with it. My insurance provided the pump do I bought this bag. There is so little extra space. You can fit the cooler and pump, but it's snug to also get the pumping tubes in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Perfectly fits my in-style pump (with hole for plug as a previous reviewer stated so you don't have to even get your pump dirty by taking it out!!!) and the medela cooler bag for 4 4 oz bottles. Looks like a stylish purse. I'm so happy with this it makes me wish I had to pump for longer (jk). I only wish I'd found it before my baby was 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: ElleZ

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Using pump in style advanced
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious bag. Has an opening to allow the pump to be plugged in without having to take it out of the bag. Plenty of compartments. Highly recommend! Using pump in style advanced.
customer_reviews.author: absentmindedwife

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It is uncomfortable to carry and it does not have much space . I wish they had the backpack available instead .
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Recommend (Too Small)
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed w this purchase. Not enough room. Looks good but super frustrating to use b/c it’s way too cramped (trouble zipping it up w pump, hands-free bra, cooler/bottles, battery pack).
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bag. Simply perfect. Took out 1 star because it is small. The pump n the cooler fit in well. But barely no space left for the pumping accessories. Beautiful bag all the same
customer_reviews.author: Hellen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I never used this bag after purchasing but it seemed very spacious and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi West

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this bag!
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty neat bag! My only complaint is that there’s only one mesh bag inside for storing. Wish there where more to fit more of the pump parts in it. But it has a good size, I like that it’s black fits with anything I wear. Enough space for your own personal stuff too like a phone and wallet a small make up bag. Just good enough for what I need to take to work with me.
customer_reviews.author: Privas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit and it is small and compact easy to take where ever I need to go.
customer_reviews.author: shortstack

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything for pumping on the go
customer_reviews.text: Fits my pump, the ice pack and easily has space for other items
customer_reviews.author: Kalilah Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Too small: fits pump, parts and cooler but anything additional ( hands free bra, pump wipes etc) makes it very difficult to zip
customer_reviews.author: Krista Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Was ok, but small. It's hard to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Was ok, but small. It's hard to fit the pump, cooler bag, and pump parts in it. There's no extra room. I ended up finding a different bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Great quality. Love the Medela logo :) Fits what I need while it’s not too bulky. I use it everyday at work.
customer_reviews.author: Wioletta

customer_reviews.title: Good for working
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic for work. I take the pump, cooler, and all the parts to and from work with this bag. It's a good size, thickness, and it's not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pump bag
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why this bag doesn’t have better reviews. It’s very well made, and attractive for what it is. It is on the smaller side, but that is why you would buy this one rather than the tote—right? I actually using this for my Spectra S2–which is a larger and oddly shaped pump. I’m able to fit the pump and tubing, 2 bottle assemblies with flanges, a hands free pump bra, the small Medela cooler, and 4 breast pads. There is not room for anything else, and that’s ok. With the Medela Pump there would still be some extra space. And for the price? You can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: christin

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality, plenty of pockets and has plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits my needs perfectly. I recently went back to work part-time and needed something to tote my pump, cooler and other accessories for at work pumping. There were other reviews that mentioned the bag they actually received was not what was pictures portrayed (lesser quality, un-secure outer pockets, etc). The bag that I received was exactly what was pictured, excellent quality, plenty of pockets and has plenty of room for my Medela Pump-In-Style Advanced, small Medela cooler and flanges. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: SHansen

customer_reviews.title: Small and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bag came with the sonata pump. It’s JUST big enough to carry the pump, tubing, power cord, cooler, one set of parts, and a couple small items (is, lanolin) stuffed in the mesh pocket. It is a TIGHT squeeze to zip it up. If you prefer to carry extra storage bottles and an extra set of pump parts for work, get a different bag. It’s also uncomfortable- the strap looks like it should be long enough to wear crossbody and it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Way too small for pump cooler and breast pump parts ...
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for pump cooler and breast pump parts! Plus Customer service at Medela won’t stand behind their failed product unless you bought it on medela.com.
customer_reviews.author: PA101

product_meta.title: Medela Breastpump Bag for all Breastpumping Essentials, Water Resistant Black Microfiber with Power Adaptor Access Port, Convenient Tote for Sonata, Freestyle, or Pump in Style Advanced Breast Pumps
product_meta.description: The Medela breast pump bag was made for comfort, organization, and convenience. Designed specifically for use with your Medela breast pump, this bag is a great on-the-go option for moms with busy, active lives. Organize and securely fit everything you need for pumping on the go or away from home in our breast pump tote bag, with plenty of room for your breast pump, accessories, and pump parts. Large top opening and low bag profile makes it especially easy to store and locate everything inside, while a top zipper closure provides discretion and security. Front zipper pockets, roomy back pockets, and a mesh pocket allow for maximized exterior and interior organization to keep tubing, other pump parts, and accessories neatly organized and securely stored. What’s Included: (1) Breast pump bag Designed with an adjustable strap for comfortable wear and easy portability, the Medela breast pump bag is made with a water-resistant microfiber material for simplified cleaning. A convenient power adapter access port allows you to charge your breast pump between pumping sessions, so you’re never without a fully charged breast pump. Dimensions are approximately 12 in. X 18 ½ in. X 6 in.
feature_bullets: Large top opening and low bag profile makes it easy to store and see everything inside
Works well with Medela Sonata, Freestyle and Pump in Style Advanced Starter breast pumps
Water-resistant microfiber material for easy cleaning
Power adaptor access port lets you charge your breast pump between sessions
Mesh pocket keeps tubing or other essentials organized

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
